68 
69 /*========== Static Function Prototypes =====================================*/
70 /**
71  * @brief convert a #DIAG_EVENT_e to a boolean for the violation flags in the database
72  * @param[in] event diag event
73  * @returns boolean indicating the error flag
74  */
75 static bool DIAG_EventToBool(DIAG_EVENT_e event);
76 
77 /*========== Static Function Implementations ================================*/
78 static bool DIAG_EventToBool(DIAG_EVENT_e event) {
79  FAS_ASSERT((event == DIAG_EVENT_OK) || (event == DIAG_EVENT_NOT_OK) || (event == DIAG_EVENT_RESET));
80  bool returnValue = false;
81  if (event == DIAG_EVENT_NOT_OK) {
82  returnValue = true; /* event is not ok, set output to true */
83  }
84  return returnValue;
85 }
86 
87 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
88 extern void DIAG_ErrorSystemMonitoring(
89  DIAG_ID_e diagId,
90  DIAG_EVENT_e event,
91  const DIAG_DATABASE_SHIM_s *const kpkDiagShim,
92  uint32_t data) {
93  FAS_ASSERT(diagId == DIAG_ID_SYSTEM_MONITORING);
94  FAS_ASSERT((event == DIAG_EVENT_OK) || (event == DIAG_EVENT_NOT_OK) || (event == DIAG_EVENT_RESET));
95  FAS_ASSERT(kpkDiagShim != NULL_PTR);
96  FAS_ASSERT(data < (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_MAX);
97 
98  if (data == (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_ENGINE) {
99  kpkDiagShim->pTableError->taskEngineTimingViolationError = DIAG_EventToBool(event);
100  } else if (data == (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_1ms) {
101  kpkDiagShim->pTableError->task1msTimingViolationError = DIAG_EventToBool(event);
102  } else if (data == (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_10ms) {
103  kpkDiagShim->pTableError->task10msTimingViolationError = DIAG_EventToBool(event);
104  } else if (data == (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_100ms) {
105  kpkDiagShim->pTableError->task100msTimingViolationError = DIAG_EventToBool(event);
106  } else if (data == (uint32_t)SYSM_TASK_ID_CYCLIC_ALGORITHM_100ms) {
107  kpkDiagShim->pTableError->task100msAlgoTimingViolationError = DIAG_EventToBool(event);
108  } else {
109  FAS_ASSERT(FAS_TRAP);
110  }
111 }
112 
113 /*========== Externalized Static Function Implementations (Unit Test) =======*/
114 #ifdef UNITY_UNIT_TEST
115 #endif
